name: DAD.
description:
INFO

Catch bugs with your web, then fling them around!

Experience buggy gameplay with even buggier powers

Collect funky hats and dress up your dad! 

Web bugs together in your strings and use them as your weapon!

Bee careful on gravel! The Slower the better!

Make sure to have a light before entering darker floors!

     

                     

 All art and content was created during the GMTK 2021 time

In game font by https://www.dafont.com/milky-nice.font

Special thanks to Warren Tech and our wonderful Alpha Nerd, Stuart Compton. We couldn't have continued this without your influence.
